snippet: Rick Santorum's support among likely Republican primary voters nationwide rose 11 percentage points after his close second-place finish in Iowa, a poll found.
abstract: Rick Santorum's support among likely Republican primary voters nationwide rose 11 percentage points after his close second-place finish in Iowa, a poll found.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- While voters in New Hampshire get ready for the nation's first primary on Tuesday, the latest national poll offers a glimpse of the country's reaction to the caucuses in Iowa.

headline.main: Santorum Got Biggest Lift From Iowa, Poll Finds
